attributes.action: request that HM the Queen dissolve parliament and initiate a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the swathe of recent expenses scandal and the procession of resignations from the Cabinet, the position of both the Prime Minister and the government has now become untenable. The longer this situation is allowed to continue, the more damage it does to the country internationally. It is therefore reasonable to ask Her Majesty to exercise her royal perogative & dissolve parliament and initiate an election, in order to allow the country to try to regain faith in its leadership and to repair its damaged international standing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
